title: The Rerun: Stand By Me's Jerry O’Connell and Wil Wheaton on Stephen King and Nostalgia
itunes:title: The Rerun: Stand By Me's Jerry O’Connell and Wil Wheaton on Stephen King and Nostalgia
itunes:subtitle: The Losers talk to Stand by Me co-stars Jerry O’Connell and Wil Wheaton about the work of Stephen King, the pitfalls of nostalgia, and the legacy of Rob Reiner's iconic coming-of-age tale. Note: These interviews were recorded way, way back in Dece...
description:
The Losers talk to Stand by Me co-stars Jerry O’Connell and Wil Wheaton about the work of Stephen King, the pitfalls of nostalgia, and the legacy of Rob Reiner's iconic coming-of-age tale. Note: These interviews were recorded way, way back in December 2017 and are being re-run in celebration fo the film's 35th anniversary.


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
